### Flow Control
```{R}
x=5;
if(x>3){
  print("x > 3")
}else{
  print("x <= 3")
}

if(x>3) print("x > 3") else print("x <= 3")

test = ifelse(x>3,"x > 3","x <= 3")
test

data(iris)
iris$new_species = factor(ifelse(iris$Species == "setosa","IsSetosa","NotSetosa"))
str(iris)

x=5;
if(x>3){
  print ("x > 3");
} else if (x ==3){
  print ("x == 3");
}else{
  print("x <= 3");
}

sen = 'good morning'
sen = 'hi bro..'
if(sen == 'good morning'){
  print('good morning!')
} else if (sen == 'good evening'){
  print('good evening!')
} else{
  print('hello!')
}

switch(2,print("aaa"),print("bbb"),print("ccc"))
switch("third",first=print("aaa"),second=print("bbb"),third=print("ccc"))


for(i in 1:10){
  print(i)
}

sum=0
for(i in 1:100){
  sum= sum+ i;
}
sum

sum(1:100)

mat = matrix(1:9, byrow=TRUE, nrow=3)
for(i in 1:nrow(mat)){
  for(j in 1:ncol(mat)){
    print(mat[i,j])
  }
}

for(i in seq_len(nrow(mat))) {
  for(j in seq_len(ncol(mat))) { 
    print(mat[i, j])
  }
}


sum = 0;
cnt = 0;
while(cnt <= 100){
  sum = sum + cnt;
  cnt = cnt + 1;
}
sum
```

  for(j in 1:ncol(mat)){
    #mat[i,j] = i * j;

    mat[i,j] = sprintf("%s * %s = %s",i,j,i*j)

mat

mat

### break / next
```{R}
#break(跳出迴圈)
for(n in 1:10){
  if(n==5){
    break
  }
  print(n)
}

#next(略過本次,類似python continue)
for(n in 1:10){
  if(n==5){
    next
  }
  print(n)
}
```
### Function
```{R}
addThree = function(a){
    return(a+3)
}
addThree(3)

#with default arguments
addThree_2 = function(a = 3) {
    return(a+3)
}
addThree_2()

addThree_3 = function(a = 3) {
    a+3
}
addThree_3()

#lazy function
f2 = function(a, b = 2, c = NULL) {
   return(b + 1)
}
f2()

#local variable
b = 3
f3 = function(a) {
    b = 2
    return(b)
}
f3()

greeting = function(sen){
  if(sen == 'good morning'){
    return('good morning!')
  } else if (sen == 'good evening'){
    return('good evening!')
  } else{
    return('hello!')
  }  
}

greeting("good morning")
```

### lapply sapply apply tapply
```{R}
x = list(c(1,2,3,4), c(5,6,7,8))
## 回傳list的結果
lapply(x, sum)
class(lapply(x, sum))
## 回傳簡化的結果(vector)
sapply(x, sum)
class(sapply(x, sum))

lapply(x,addThree)
## 匿名函式

m1 = matrix(1:4, byrow=TRUE, nrow=2)
m2 = matrix(5:8, byrow=TRUE, nrow=2)
li = list(m1, m2)
lapply(li, function(e){e[1,]})
lapply(li, mean)

m = matrix(1:4, byrow=TRUE, nrow=2)
apply(m, 1, sum) # rowsums
apply(m, 2, sum) # colsums

rowmeans = apply(m, 1, mean)
colmeans = apply(m, 2, mean)

x = c(80,70,59,88,72,57)
t = c(1,1,2,1,1,2)
tapply(x,t, mean)

data(iris)

tapply(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Species, mean)
tapply(iris$Sepal.Length,iris$Species,function(e){list(avg=mean(e),md=median(e),s_d = sd(e))})

lapply(names(iris[1:4]),function(e){tapply(iris[,e],iris$Species,mean) })
```
